Zenfully
Landing

Zenfully Landing is a landing page I built for the web application Zenfully, a tool that helps users concentrate and sleep.
Visit Site

My Role

I was brought on this project by Motiv Studio to build out the frontend features of this website. This project existed within the larger web application they were working on called Zenfully. They had already designed an architecture for the application which I learned and built the landing page within.
